attributes.action: allow the brave Victoria Cross winning Gurkha to move to the UK to receive life saving medical treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reports in the press state that despite his heroic acts in attacking a Japanese position in WW2 and being awarded our highest honour. It appears that someone has now decided that he has no connection with this country. I feel the Prime Minister should act now to ensure that he is able to travel the UK immediately
